Line 36: Line 36:
The software functions entirely as advertised, but the "100% clean" rating is misleading. Users who install Orbit Downloader will notice that their homepages are rerouted to an Orbit-branded version of Google, and the default search box in Internet Explorer is also changed to the Orbit search function. This is easily avoided, however, by un-selecting the appropriate boxes during the installation of the program.
The software functions entirely as advertised, but the "100% clean" rating is misleading. Users who install Orbit Downloader will notice that their homepages are rerouted to an Orbit-branded version of Google, and the default search box in Internet Explorer is also changed to the Orbit search function. This is easily avoided, however, by un-selecting the appropriate boxes during the installation of the program.
â
The program also has services that continue to run in the background even after manually exiting the software. It is unknown what this service does in the background.
+
The program also has services that continue to run in the background even after manually exiting the software. It is unknown what this service does in the background. {{fact}}
